extendedInfo.description: See more Crime films from Creepster at http://www.creepster.tv/genres/Crime.htmlBoris Karloff reprises his role as Mr. Wong, the mystery-solving man in "Asian" makeup. An ineffectual policeman tails Mr. Wong around while he investigates a string of murders.Don't forget to subscribe to our Creepster channel to get unlimited enjoyment of the best classic/retro horror, science fiction, film noir, crime movies and more. We support all popular mobile platforms, Roku players and computers. Visit http://www.creepster.tvTune in to creep out!(tm)
